item.title: Literature Reading Notes (#2025V23/27/34): 3I/ATLAS
item.description:
3I/ATLAS is an interstellar comet discovered by the Asteroid Terrestrial-impact Last Alert System (ATLAS) station at RÃ­o Hurtado, Chile on 1 July 2025.

As reported in many recent studies, the closer it approaches perihelion, the more clearly it exhibits comet-like characteristics.
